input: Which one of the following is not a component of the Realist Theory? (CDS 2015-II)

options.A: The State is the preeminent actor
options.B: State sovereignty is important for the affirmation of juridical authority over territory
options.C: The primary objective of all States is survival
options.D: Survival can be assured in cooperation with international organizations

explanation: Realists believe in self assistance. They think that no other country may be trusted for the survival.
